TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ArrangedElementCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ArrangedElementCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表設計介面上或在父系內部排列物件的集合。The class represents a collection of objects arranged on a design surface or inside a parent . 有沒有公開定義的建構函式中因為它設計為只在內部內使用[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。There are no publicly defined constructors in because it is designed to be used only internally within the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 不過，類別衍生自，例如，可用來開發人員。However, classes derived from , such as , are available to the developer.

threadsafe.span: 公用(在 Visual Basic 中) 這種類型的成員都具備執行緒安全。

span.span: Public ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 不保證執行個體成員是安全執行緒。

span.span: Instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 可以支援多個讀取器同時，只要未修改集合。

span.span: An can support multiple readers concurrently, as long as the collection is not modified.

threadsafe.span: 方法會傳回，可用來存取項目。

span.span: The method returns an that can be used to access elements.

threadsafe.span: 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使集合經過同步化，其他執行緒仍然可以修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

summary.span: Copies the entire contents of this collection to a compatible one-dimensional , starting at the specified index of the target array.

span.span: Copies the entire contents of this collection to a compatible one-dimensional , starting at the specified index of the target array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的陣列型別必須與來源集合。The type of the specified array must be compatible with the source collection. 這個方法會使用複製項目的方法。This method uses the method to copy the elements.

summary.span: Gets the number of elements in the collection.

span.span: Gets the number of elements in the collection.

value.span: 目前集合中包含的項目數目。

span.span: The number of elements currently contained in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必要時，集合的容量會動態地增加以接受多個項目。When required, the capacity of the collection will dynamically increase to accept more elements.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetEnumerator () As IEnumerator
abstract member GetEnumerator : unit -> System.Collections.IEnumerator override this.GetEnumerator : unit -> System.Collections.IEnumerator

summary.span: Returns an enumerator for the entire collection.

span.span: Returns an enumerator for the entire collection.
An for the entire collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取因此，列舉集合在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Typically the enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他執行緒仍然可以修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以依照下列策略的其中一個：To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can follow one of the following strategies: - 使用整個列舉過程中鎖定集合。Lock the collection during the entire enumeration using a . - 攔截和處理從由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。Catch and handle the exceptions that result from changes made by other threads.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean
public: virtual property bool IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

summary.span: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.

value.span: 如果集合是唯讀，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the collection is read-only; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 唯讀的集合不允許在集合建立後增加、 移除或修改項目。A read-only collection does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 唯讀的集合是唯讀的集合只具有可防止修改集合的包裝函式。A read-only collection is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection. 如果基礎集合進行變更，唯讀的集合會反映這些變更。If changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes.
